sentence: Others running in the race include former Ohio treasurer and two-time Senate candidate Josh Mandel; former Ohio GOP Chair Jane Timken; Cleveland businessman and luxury auto dealership giant Bernie Moreno; 2018 Ohio Republican Senate candidate Mike Gibbons, a Cleveland entrepreneur, real estate developer, and investment banker; and Matt Dolan, a longtime state lawmaker whose family owns Major League Baseball’s Cleveland Guardians.
author: Terresa Monroe-Hamilton
title: JD Vance massively triggers left with glowing MTG endorsement, vow to take country back from ‘scumbags’

sentence: The unorthodox event is set to take place on Thursday in Columbus and will feature Democrat Morgan Harper and Republican Josh Mandel.

sentence: During the fiery hour-and-a-half event between Republican Josh Mandel and Democrat Morgan Harper, Mandel repeatedly attacked Ryan for failing to debate Harper so far and portrayed it as fundamental disrespect among state Democrats for their Black voter base.

sentence: All major Republican candidates have expressed opposition to trade with China, and top two candidates Mike Gibbons and Josh Mandel nearly came to blows at a March 18 debate over Mandel’s accusation that Gibbons traded Chinese petroleum stock.
